about_the_game:
Do you know rock-paper-scissors? But what if the scissors is a ninja that suddenly summons lightning? That is the principle of this game. 2 players choose a character and equip it with artefacts, attributes and weapons and let them fight each other automatically.

Short and sweet

A card multiplay auto battler. Choose your hero. Choose a supporter and start looking for an opponent. Choose wisely between artifacts, status cards and weapons to defeat your opponent. Win the best of 3 and get ranking points ;)

a bit longer ;)


There are characters with different stats and special effects.
There are various supporters that you can take with you on your fights, who will support you once with their different abilities if you are 2 points behind.
With your 5 points, choose between artefacts, status cards and weapons to equip your hero in the best possible and most specialized way.
Many artifacts have an enhanced form that is shuffled into the selection deck after selection.
After each round, things are equipped for your hero again until the game is over.
It ends with 3 wins or 3 losses.
Climb up the leaderboard and become the best.

what else is there?


- Collect crapies to unlock loot cards
- Exchange your found bones for hero card parts
- Swap your hero card pieces to unlock heroes or get crapies
- Find emblems and customize your profile
- Customize your supporters in the locker room

content_descriptors.notes: The fighting between the Players containing Pixelblood.
